contextswitching.ContextSwitchingModel

    Package Description
    contextswitching

    • Uses of ContextSwitchingModel in contextswitching

      Methods in contextswitching that return ContextSwitchingModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContextSwitchingModel ContextSwitchingModel.configureModel(ModelConfiguration config)
      Configure the model
      ContextSwitchingModel ContextSwitchingModel.initializeModel()
      Must be called before start, meaning before the simulation starts one must: configureModel(...) initializeModel(); run the simulation Configures the model according to the parameters specified with the configureModel(...) method This should be done before dispatching the model to the grid as some configurations require reading local files
      Constructors in contextswitching with parameters of type ContextSwitchingModel 
      Constructor and Description
      Agent(int id, ContextSwitchingModel model)
      Constructor creates an agent with the given id value and no memory of choices observed
